# Data Directory

This directory is for storing sensitive local data files that should NOT be committed to version control.

## Contents

This directory should contain:
- `sysinfo.txt` - System information export (from Windows msinfo32 or similar tools)
- `system-info-formatted.md` - Formatted system information summary
- Any other personal or sensitive data files

### File Descriptions

**sysinfo.txt**: Raw system information export containing hardware details, OS configuration, network settings, and device information. Generated by running `msinfo32` and exporting to text format on Windows.

**system-info-formatted.md**: A human-readable markdown summary of the system information, including hardware overview, security features, and performance notes.

## Important

All files in this directory are gitignored. They exist only on your local machine.

## Setting Up Your Local Data

1. Download or export your system information
2. Place the files in this directory
3. The application will read from this location

## Backing Up

Since these files are not in version control, make sure to:
- Keep local backups
- Store copies in a secure location
- Do not share files containing personal information
